addr: 250 SOUTH 6TH AVE MOUNT VERNON,, NEW YORK  10550
title: GRANDMA'S HANDS THEATER PLAY!!
desc: Theater play Benefit/Fundraiser event to support the american heart association.? The play, is about family values, and the importance of being united as a family.? Never would you imagine how diffrent the world would be without our grandparents, and the important values of that what they have taught the family. Jason Mcphatter, comedian, actor, playwright, director, nephew of r&b famed Clyde Mcphatter of the 50's and 60's famed "Drifters" and God son to Grammy Award Winning Vickie Winans. Has gathered together a fantastic star studded cast bringing you levels of funny that will have you rolling in the isles!! wrote Fred Savage... this play is a must see, wrote Lynn Whitfeild. If you think Tyler Perry's "Madea" is funny? just wait till you see Jason Mcphatter as "Lula Mae" wrote Rosie O'Donnel.. This is something you dont wanna miss! wrote Vickie Winans.. here's a clip from Lula Mae: ?https://youtu.be/vj2GFDRSmOw It's truly because of him, I am! and I hope to see you there! wrote Jason Mcphatter...
